newsitem.title: USA: Times Mirror raises qtly payout to $0.15.
newsitem.headline: Times Mirror raises qtly payout to $0.15.

text.p: Times Mirror Co Thursday declared a 50 percent increase in the second quarter dividend to $0.15 a share from $0.10 a share on both Series A Common Stock and Series C Common Stock.
The dividend is payable on June 10 to shareholders of record on May 30.

"Today's 50 percent dividend increase, along with our ongoing share repurchase program, reflects our continuing commitment to create and provide value to our shareholders," said Mark Willes, Times Mirror chairman, president and chief executive officer.
